resources.string: Has experience with Java and C++. Worked as a system software specialist at CAE. Currently working on a research project in computer engineering Interested in hardware/ software interfacing and electronics
Knowledge: Ruby, HTML, CSS, SQL. Has experience in Web design and UI. Is interests: Power and renewable energy

Knows Python, Java. Has experience as a Systems Test Analyst with experience in networking/routing (physical and software) and scripting. Interested in Telecommunications, both networking and signal processing, and electronics

Fluent in C/C++, Python, C#, Java and Bash. Has experience in Video Game development (Gameplay and Engine), Android Applications and Linux Systems Programming. Major interests are Software Performance Optimization and Operating Systems.

.Hike was possible thanks to:
